nodes.text: The Black Delve was a location in space, situated within the Har Worlds sector of the Expansion Region. In the 690s BBY, the Judicial Forces of the Galactic Republic played a key role in the conflict known as the Battles of the Black Delve.

The Black Delve was first mentioned in the 2012 reference book The Essential Guide to Warfare, which was authored by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart, and was placed in grid square J-16 by the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas.
